### Tender for HVAC and Refrigeration Repair Services

#### Overview
VIA Rail Canada Inc. invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of HVAC and Refrigeration Repair Services at Winnipeg Maintenance Centre.

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: MX-443289640774
* **Publication Date**: 2024-10-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-11-25T18:00:00
* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is governed by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: [Not specified]

The scope of work and technical requirements are presented under Part B - Appendix A - Scope of Work and Specifications of the ITT.
